text:
@nytimes @GovJVentura Police using tear gas and pepper spray causes people to tear up and cough, which could increase the risk of #COVID19 transmission. 

@MayorOfLA @LAPDHQ ban the use of #TearGas + #PepperSpray immediately. That’s the science. #EndPoliceBrutality
